div.p: B.S.H. conceived the study, secured funding, oversaw the project, and prepared the initial manuscript draft; M.F. and J.A. prepared and curated data; M.F. conducted analyses; B.S.H. and M.F. designed and implemented methods and visualizations; B.S.H., M.F., J.A., J.S.L., F.M., C.O., C.S., and K.A.S. reviewed and edited the manuscript.
